921070.name: Spellwake
921070.description:
Spellwake is an online 3D Action RPG. In this game, the world has been invaded by an overpowering planar force. You play as a renegade who takes up arms and decides to kill as many invaders as possible.

Features:
  • Fast-paced hack n' slash against hordes of monsters and powerful bosses.
  • A vast class system with few restrictions. You can combine any classes to make creative and original builds.
  • Anything Goes. We want all builds to be viable and fun.
  • Full multiplayer. No account creation. Just start the game and play with your friends.
  • Free to play. Nothing is locked.
  • An open world to explore. No areas are restricted.
  • Scripted raid bosses.
  • Magic items, unique items, currency items and a crafting system.
  • Endless replayability with our Unleash system where any area can become maximum level.
  • Randomly generated areas and monsters.
  • No PvP outside a designated area. Everyone works together.

Spellwake was made by a pair of independent programmers without a 3D artist. We hope that the gameplay is a lot of fun despite the lacking graphics.
921070.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
